message: Statify is a website monitoring service, It's my first python django project, right now it's just a landing page but feedback would be welcomed. Thanks. http://statifyme.com

That is alot of purple. The landing page is clean. You may want to describe your product a little better. Try to explain what you (will) have that is better then the competition. Also reconsider the logo. I this its supposed to be a mouse cursor but I'm not for sure on that and it doesn't really convey what your app will do. All and all nice work.
